name: Hoola Demon (GMTK Jam 2021)
description:
Hoola Demon - GMTK Jam 2021 (Developed in  ~40 hours)

Deep in your slumber in a comfy rocky bed and then summoned by a bunch of cultists!

Nobody likes being woken up. Especially demons.

They are trying to subdue you, but you’re not going to let them capture you easily - break the circle and get out of their dungeon!

How to play:

Spacebar - Charge Demon

WASD - Move Demon

R - Reset Level

When you hit the cultist circle you disrupt their chanting and now can swing them like a hoolahoop! To get to the next level you need to hit the cultists hoop over 3 spike traps.

Don’t stand in a circle for too long or they will subdue you!

Break the connection of cultists and move to the next level!

When you see magic pits - they boost the speed of the chanting for cultists.

Spinning walls can damage only you so be careful!

P.S. This is our first game ever.  So that was an amazing experience to boost our knowledge of UE4
